```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Part 2a
```{r}
sample_mean <- function(vec, n) {
  
  sample1 <- sample(vec, n)
  mean(sample1, na.rm = TRUE)
  
}
```
## Part 2b
```{r}
many_sample_means <- function(vec, n, reps) {
  
  replicate(reps, sample_mean(vec, n))
}
```

## Part 2c
```{r}
sample_means_ns <- function(vec, reps, ns) {
  
  means <- map(ns, ~many_sample_means(vec, .x, reps))
  
  tibble(
    sample_mean = unlist(means),
    n = rep(ns, each = reps)
  )
  
}

```

## Part 2 test cases
```{r}
vec <- runif(1000)
sample_mean(vec, 50)
many_sample_means(vec, reps = 10, n = 50)
sample_means_ns(vec, reps = 10, ns = c(5, 50, 500))
```
